name: Gambero rosso crudo
description: Fresh red prawns served raw, showcasing their natural flavors and delicate texture.
ingredients_list: Fresh red prawns, lemon, olive oil, sea salt, black pepper, fresh herbs like parsley or basil

name: Gamberi grigliati con verdure
description: Grilled shrimp with vegetables: Succulent shrimp grilled to perfection, accompanied by a medley of grilled vegetables for a delicious and healthy dish.
ingredients_list: Grilled shrimp, bell peppers, zucchini, eggplant, cherry tomatoes, olive oil, garlic, salt, black pepper, fresh parsley

name: Guazzetto di gamberi
description: A shrimp stew is a savory seafood dish made by simmering shrimp in a flavorful broth with tomatoes, garlic, onions, herbs, and spices, resulting in a rich and aromatic delicacy.
ingredients_list: Shrimp, tomatoes, garlic, onions, olive oil, white wine, fish stock, parsley, basil, thyme, salt, black pepper, red pepper flakes

name: Paella con gambero gigante
description: Paella with king prawns: A traditional Spanish rice dish cooked with flavorful broth, saffron, and an assortment of seafood including large king prawns, creating a rich and aromatic meal.
ingredients_list: Rice, king prawns, saffron, chicken broth, olive oil, garlic, onions, tomatoes, bell peppers, peas, green beans, mussels, clams, squid, paprika, salt, black pepper, lemon wedges, parsley

name: Cruditè di gamberi
description: Shrimp crudité: Fresh shrimp served raw as a refreshing appetizer, often accompanied by dipping sauces or dressings for added flavor.
ingredients_list: Fresh shrimp, lemon wedges, cocktail sauce, aioli, soy sauce, wasabi, sea salt, black pepper, fresh herbs like dill or cilantro

name: Tagliatelle with Ragù Sauce
description: Tagliatelle with ragù sauce is a delightful combination of freshly cut fettuccine pasta and a dense, flavorful sauce made with ground meat, tomato, and herbs, perfectly melded to create a rich and satisfying dish, symbolizing Italian cuisine.
ingredients_list: Fresh or dried tagliatelle pasta, Ground meat, Onion, Carrot, Celery, Tomato paste, Tomato passata, Red wine, Extra virgin olive oil, Salt and pepper, Oregano, Basil, Broth

name: Assorted Cold Cuts Appetizer
description: An assorted cold cuts appetizer is an explosion of flavors and Italian tradition, featuring a selection of cured meats such as prosciutto, salami, coppa, and thinly sliced pancetta arranged elegantly on a plate. Accompanied by crispy bread and condiments such as pickles and olives, it's a perfect start to a rich and convivial meal.
ingredients_list: Assorted cold cuts of the day, Olives, Cherry tomatoes, Special sauce

name: Sliced Adult Beef Steak
description: Sliced beef steak is a succulent and flavorful dish, composed of perfectly grilled beef slices cut into thin strips. Served on a bed of fresh arugula, drizzled with extra virgin olive oil, sprinkled with sea salt, and topped with shavings of Parmesan cheese, it's an unforgettable culinary experience that enhances the flavors of the meat.
ingredients_list: Beef sirloin steak, Arugula salad, Cherry tomatoes

name: Mixed Grill of Meat with Seasonal Vegetables
description: A mixed grill of meat and vegetables is a feast for the senses, with tasty beef steaks, succulent sausages, and marinated chicken, paired with a variety of colorful vegetables like peppers, zucchini, and eggplants, all grilled to perfection and seasoned with aromatic herbs and extra virgin olive oil. A dish that celebrates the freshness and simplicity of natural flavors.
ingredients_list: Steaks, skewers, sausages, zucchini, peppers

name: Appetizer Platter
description: An abundant appetizer platter is a palate pleaser, featuring a variety of exquisite cold cuts such as prosciutto, salami, and coppa, assorted cheeses like pecorino and gorgonzola, accompanied by olives, pickles, dried fruits, and crispy bread, offering a rich and satisfying culinary experience to be shared with friends.
ingredients_list: Prosciutto, salami, coppa, pecorino cheese, gorgonzola cheese, olives, pickles, dried fruits, crispy bread

name: Fritto misto di mare
description: A delightful assortment of fried seafood, including shrimp, calamari, and fish, served golden and crispy alongside dipping sauces.
ingredients_list: Calamari, shrimp, vegetables

name: Medaglione di vitello
description: Tender cuts of veal, seared to perfection and served with a savory sauce, often accompanied by vegetables or potatoes.
ingredients_list: Veal, vegetables
